name: A Totally Accurate Night At The Theatre - Real Name Coming
name_original: A Totally Accurate Night At The Theatre - Real Name Coming
description:
But Soft! Take your seats and jump into the world of Shakespeare and his famous tragedy: Romeo and Juliet. As a play that has been performed countless of times, be prepared for new twists, spins, and flips on physics and dramatic romance as we know it. 

CONTROLS: QWOP

Designers:

JD Calvelli (@jdcalvelli) - Lead Programmer 
Irene Li (@irene-li) - Narrative Designer/Programmer
Devinne Moses (@DevinneM) - Narrative Designer/Sound Designer/Project Manager
Sia Yang (@siyaSIAY) - Lead Artist
